text: @ScrambledAdams Tiffany had to stop herself from saying that at least you don't have to believe any of this, mind you.

passages.fragment: Tiffany had to stop herself from saying
passages.full_quote: <used>Tiffany had to stop herself from saying</used> "the sky is green" just to see how long it would take for Petulia to agree

passages.fragment: to stop herself from saying that at least you do n't have to
passages.full_quote: She tried to feel sympathetic and found that she was, really, but she did have <used>to stop herself from saying that at least you don't have to</used> find styles that can easily be undone by claws

passages.fragment: do n't have to believe any of this , mind you .
passages.full_quote: "I <used>don't have to believe any of this, mind you</used>."
